I checked and there is no System.exit() in the code under test.  I 
also ra=
n your testcase, and the results are similar but different.  
In both cases=
, I see the console showing only <terminated..>.  But 
in your test case, t=
he JUnit panel in eclipse shows the test being 
run and the bar progresses.=
  In my test case, the JUnit panel shows 
nothing being run and there is no=
 progress bar.  All it says at the 
top of the JUnit panel is "Launching Te=
stLocalUserMapperService..."  
Then, the console show that the test has ter=
minated.  

I believe my test case is okay because it worked previously.  I=
 can 
also run the same test case on my home computer.  But it does not 
wo=
rk on my office computer.  I can't figure out what exactly is 
causing ecli=
pse or Junit to not function.  Is there something that 
it depends on?  

W=
hen I try to debug the test case, it says "Could not connect to 
VM.  Socke=
t closed."

Thanks,
yck
